item.title: Forest & Desert by Beth Andres-Beck
item.author: sharrewijnen@live.com (Sander Harrewijnen)
item.description:
The article describes two distinct cultures that exist for software development. The forest and the desert.

There is a path from the desert to the forest, a series of small, safe steps a community can take to terraform the landscape. No developer can do it alone, and no amount of technology will get us there, but it is possible.

  • Beth Andres-Beck

https://tidyfirst.substack.com/p/forest-and-desert
